unnormalised: Bore, tumi competitive exam crack korcheak sodhtai, kiteak? Kadachit JEE, NEET, vo CAT-achem kitem-i? Poileam vostunk poilem, chill! Tem duniyechen shevott nhoi, zata zalear tem kiteak chukun dista. Coaching centres distat, *soglleak-i* aizkal. Tori tumi koxem ek boreak vinchun kaddtat? Diya amhi tem bhag bhag kortelim.
normalised: Boro, tumche dolle ek spordhatmak porikshek lagleat dista, mhunnche J-E-E, N-E-E-T, vo C-A-T sarkhea porikshek? Pailim, shant rav! Ti sonvsarachoch ant nhoi, kitem tori tea bhaxen dista tori. Coaching kendram azkal sogllea vatten asat. Tor tumi sarkem kendr koxem vinchun kaddtleat? Te todde bhaganim vanttum-ia.

unnormalised: Mhaka ugddas asa mhunn hanv mhoje engineering entrance-ak '08-ant toyar kortalam. Mhoje avoi-bapui khub stress-an asle, ani hanv ek coaching class-ant sampoddlo zo ek xirdord axilo adhar-a-poros. Tannim chandneachem vaad dilem - rank 1, guaranteed IIT seat, blah blah blah. Uprant dista, tem soglleuch fancy marketing ani ek khupuch pressure axilem.
normalised: Mhaka ugddas asa don hozar ani aatthant hanv mojea engineering pravesh porikshek toyari kortalo tedna. Mhoje avoi-bapui zaite chintit asle, ani hanv ek coaching klasak gelo zo fuddem dukhpat zala. Tanni chandnneo dakoile- pahilo rank, garantid I-I-T seat, asa tasha. Punn taka favo marketing ani khup dabav.

unnormalised: Poileam vostunk tumi korcheak zai tem tumchi xikonk style samzun gheunk. Tum tumchea vorgant boreant xiktat tech pori, ek xikxak whiteboard-ar vostu somzaitalo? Vo tum tumchea sove-vegaan xikonk utam, online resources ani record kelelim lectures-am sangatak? Kaim zonn competitive environment-an vaddhtat, zalear dusre sampurnn poristhitint vollollon jattaat. Tumchea aapanak ollkha!
normalised: Tumkam pailim tumchi xikpachi sthili zanna zai. Tum texe bhaxen aslolo zannar asa zaka kelasam'mantlim xikxok blackbordacher sangta tedna borem dista? Vo tumka tumchea vegantlean xikpak borem dista online sadhnam ani record kel'le updeshnam sodun? Thoddea lokank spordhatmak vataveranan favo zata punn her lokachem mansik sontulan harap zata. Tumi tumkam vollkhata!

unnormalised: Uprant, tumchem research kora. Fakth vhodd nanvancheak zai naka – FIITJEE, Aakash, Allen – tankam soglleam khatir favo nasta. Seniors-am sangata ulai, online reviews vacha (tankam ek mekh mellovn geunchea), ani centres-ak zata zaiteim visit kara. Tanchi infrastructure check kora, tanchi shikpachea vostunche quality, ani, soglleant mukhel, tanchi xikshak-anchem anubhav ani qualifications. Udharonak, mhojea ixt Rohan Vibrant Academy-ant JEE toyari khatir gelo ani tannem sanglam tanchi chemistry faculty-i boreantli bore asun, khas korun Mr. Sharma.
normalised: Uprant, shodh laita. Dhon-mottea namankodde vochona – F-I-I-T-J-E-E, Aakash, Allen – te soddeachea lokank favo zainam. Senior-ank uloita, online reviuvo vacha (thoddem udok ghea punn!), ani kendramk bhett di. Tancho infrastructure, tanchea vostunchi gunnvatta, ani mukhielponnan xikxokanchem anubhav ani yogyota vollkha. Udahoronnak, mhozo ixtt Rohan J-E-E toyariek Vibrant Academyk gelo ani tannem sanglem tanchem chemistry faculty khub borem aslem, khas korun Mister Sharma.

unnormalised: Chamkeche ad-am poros dista ani khorench shikpachea paddhatir laksh di. Tim rote learning-ar laksh ditat vo conceptual samzannear? Tim doubt-clearing sessions regular ditat? Tim kedna mock tests chalaum ditat? Ani tim tumchea performance-ar tumkam koxem feedback ditat? Ugddas dovra, tem problem solve korpakuch nhoi; tem samzannechea adharanneachem concept-an vixim asa.
normalised: Chamkotit ishtiharat voir nodor dovornakat punn xikxonnache paddhaticher laksh di. Te tokann xikxonnacher laksh ditat vo tatvik samzaikacher? Te som'peponnan dubavo nivarannancheo boska ditat? Kitlea vellar te mock test ghetat? Ani te tumchea karyakromacher kitlea prakarachi tipnneo ditat? Ugddas dovrat, te fuddavo sodovpacho vixoi nhoi; te tatvik samzai vollkhapacho vixoi.

unnormalised: Kathinn proxn vichrunk bhik naka. Tancho student-teacher ratio kitem asa? Tancho top colleges-am-n bhurgeank mellunk track record kitem asa? Tum aizache vo fattle bhurgea sangata uloum yeta? Coaching institutes samanya-n 90%+ success rate sangtat, punn metrics-an odik khurolai!
normalised: Katthinn proxn vichrunk bhieunk naka. Tanchem vidhyarthi-xikxok vevo sthapann kitem? Ut'tom kolejint bhitor sorlolea vidhyarthianchem itihas kitem? Tumi vartoman vo eks vidhyarthiank uloi yeta? Coaching institute soddeachea ut'tork zaite pongddanchem pongddan bhaxxa bhaxxa kortat, punn onkddo sodun kadd!

unnormalised: Kharoch punn factor asa, tench mhunnun. Coaching fees Rs. 50,000 thaun Rs. 2,00,000 vo odik-ui aasanv yeta, institute ani course-ar depend axun. Punn fakth cheap option-ak zai naka. Ugddas dovra, tum tumchea fuddarar invest kortat. Commit korchem poilim demo classes geunk vichar kara.
normalised: Kharchui ek karann asa. Coaching fees ruppea ponchvon hozaranim ruppea don lakh vo adhikai zai, institute ani courseak odharit. Punn sokol kharchik marg vinchink naka. Ugddas dovrat, tum tumchea bhavixak invest kortat. Bhitor vochpak dem'mo kelas ghea.

unnormalised: Online coaching ek vhodd vosto aizkal asa. Unacademy ani Vedantu bhaxea platforms khup courses ditat, samanya-n komi molancher. Tim tumi aapanank motivate ani discipline dhorla zalear ek boreak option aasanv yeta. Plus, tum tumchea sove-vegaan tumchea gharaache sukhant xikonv yeta, tumchea pajamas-am sangata, ek cup chai sangata.
normalised: Online coaching azkal zaite famad zalea, platforms Unacademy ani Vedantu zaite courses ditat, soddeachea somoya khatir soddeachea molant. Tumi poripotnachea monan utsahit zai tor te ut'tom sadhan zaite. Fuddarak tum tumchea ghara bhitor, tumchea pajama bhitor, ani chaiacho kop gheun xik yeta.

unnormalised: Ek vosto mhaka dukh asa hanvem online resources *alongside* regular coaching-ak try na kella. Khan Academy bhaxea websites (sampurnn free!), Physics Wallah YouTube-ar, ani NCERT-anche textbooks-ui apunn sonneache khonn asa. Tankam komi andaz naka.
normalised: Ek vostu hanv ponnttayta tumchya niyomit coaching borabor online sadhan vapurun dekhunk zai. Website Khan Academy (sopurnn fulkat), Physics Wallah YouTubecher, ani N-C-E-R-T pustakam svota zaite mahitichim gharkoni asat. Tancho opman korunk naka!

unnormalised: Shevottak, ugddas dovra coaching ekuch bhag equation-acho asa. Tumak azun punn kathinn kam korcheak poddtolo, focus dovrunk, ani tumchen aapichie dekhbhal korcheak poddtolo. Purench nind ghevn, borem jevn, ani tumak break zai tevh break geun. Tem ek marathon asa, ek sprint nhoi. Soglle boreak vortta JEE 2025-ak vo kosli-i exam tumi toyari kortat, yaar!
normalised: Nimannek, ugddas dovrat coaching ek bhag asa. Tumi tanka favo astikponn divpak zai, laksh dinvchem, ani tumchi dekhbhal korunk zai. Tankach favo nind ghea, sust khaddio khata, ani tumka visranthichi goroz asa tedna visranthi ghea. Te marathon asa, ek dhonv nhoi. J-E-E don hozar ponchvis vo kitle porikshek toyari asa, tumkam favo zavo!
